steps.title: "Link in bio" means you posted a website that you want your IG followers to visit.
steps.content: "Link in bio" means you posted a website that you want your IG followers to visit. Currently, Instagram just lets you post one link, or URL, in your bio. Make it count and bring attention to a page where you really want traffic, such as a blog or a small business. [3] X Research source If you want people to see all your social media platforms, you can post a page that has all of your links, such as Linktree. Draw extra attention to your URL and post a fun IG story with the caption â€œlink in bio.â€ Your followers might be curious right away.
